captions.text:
HI! I’M CATIE WAYNE AND THIS IS ANIMALIST
NEWS! TODAY I’D LIKE TO SHARE WITH YOU THE

TOP 3 WILD CATS YOU WISH YOU COULD DOMESTICATE,
OR HAVE AS A NORMAL HOUSE CAT. I’M SURE

THERE ARE PEOPLE OUT THERE WHO ACTUALLY OWN
THESE WILD CATS AND ALL I GOT TO SAY ABOUT

THAT IS….ARE YOU CRAZY? THESE ARE WILD ANIMALS,
AND HAVE NO PLACE INSIDE OF A HOUSE. BUT CAN

I PLEASE COME OVER SOMETIME? LETS BEGIN!
--# 1! THE CARACAL! THIS IS ONE CUTE CAT THAT

YOU SHOULD KEEP YOUR DISTANCE FROM, BECAUSE
UNLIKE OTHER SMALL AFRICAN CATS, CARACALS

WILL NOT HESITATE TO KILL PREY LARGER THAN
THEMSELVES. CARACAL’S ARE KNOWN FOR THEIR

JET BLACK EARS WITH LONG TUFTS, AND THEIR
PLAIN, UNMARKED COAT. THEY’RE ALSO KNOWN

FOR LEAPING UP TO THREE FEET IN THE AIR TO
CATCH BIRDS ON THE WING. CARACALS ACTUALLY

USED TO BE TRAINED AS BIRD HUNTERS IN IRAN
AND INDIA, AND ARE STILL KEPT AS PETS BY SOME

PEOPLE TODAY.
---MOVING ON TO #2! THE OCELOT- THESE ADORABLE

CATS ARE FOUND IN REGIONS FROM SOUTHERN TEXAS,
TO NORTHERN ARGENTINA, AND ARE ABOUT TWICE

THE SIZE OF YOUR AVERAGE HOUSECAT. THEIR BEAUTIFUL
COAT CAMOUFLAGES THEM INTO THICK VEGETATION,

AND HELPS THEM HUNT BIRDS, SNAKES, LIZARDS,
AND EVEN FISH AND CRAB! THAT’S RIGHT! THESE

LITTLE GUYS CAN SWIM WELL, AND WOULD MAKE
GREAT WATER PALS…AS LONG AS THEY DON’T

CHANGE THEIR MIND ABOUT HAVING YOU AROUND...
--AT LAST COMING IN AS MY FAVORITE WILD CAT

I WISH I COULD DOMESTICATE! IS THE SAND CAT!
SAND CATS ARE THE ONLY CAT SPECIES FOUND PRIMARILY

IN THE DESERT. THEY ARE NATIVE TO NORTHERN
AFRICA, AND BOTH SOUTHWEST AND CENTRAL ASIA.

THESE CATS ARE RIDICULOUSLY TINY, AND PEOPLE
OFTEN MISTAKE THEM FOR KITTENS OR A DOMESTIC

CATS! SAND CATS ARE VERY ACTIVE AT NIGHT BEING
PRIMARILY NOCTURNAL, THEY HUNT BY DIGGING-

USING THEIR BIG EARS TO LOCATE THEIR PREY
BELOW AND ABOVE GROUND. THEIR DIET CONSISTS

OF RODENTS, BIRDS, REPTILES, AND SNAKES. SOUNDS
LIKE A PRETTY NORMAL HOUSE CAT. OH! AND SAND

CATS CAN SURVIVE WITHOUT WATER, USING THE
BODY FLUID FROM THEIR PREY 
TO SURVIVE.

title: Top 3 Wildcats You Wish Were Domesticated

comments.text:
These videos are so condescending they make me less supportive of this 
point of view.  Are you implying that all of our domesticated animals 
materialized that way? Are you saying that nobody should ever try to 
domesticate anything ever again? Everything we eat is a domesticated plant 
or animal. What exactly is your message without the syrupy cloak?﻿

comments.text:
The REAL list:
1. Snow leopard
2. Mountain lion
3. Cheetah

Don't deign to tell me which 3 I wish were domesticated. Use the pronoun 
"I" when expressing your own stupid opinions. And are they ever stupid! Who 
needs more varieties of small cats, we've already got those. And stubby 
short tailed ones too. Hell no, there's almost no point to cats if not for 
their tails. That's why snow leopard is #1 on my list.﻿
